node.nodeDescription: Creates three successively larger ice explosions in the target direction. Each explosion deals more damage than the last.

node.description: Glacier’s middle-sized explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a chance to chill enemies.
node.nodeDescription: The middle sized explosion has [25%] additional chance to chill per point and gains [25%] increased damage per point

node.description: Each of Glacier’s explosions has a chance to chill enemies.
node.nodeDescription: Adds [25%] chance to chill per point

node.loreText: The power of ice can be unexpectedly explosive
node.nodeDescription: Creates three successively larger ice explosions in the target direction. Each explosion deals more damage than the last.

node.description: Glacier’s largest explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a chance to chill enemies.
node.nodeDescription: The largest explosion has [25%] additional chance to chill per point and gains [15%] increased damage per point

node.description: Each of Glacier’s explosions has a chance to chill enemies.

node.loreText: The power of ice can be unexpectedly explosive
